title: Darsh Dronobotics ties up with Trouve Innovation Hub for development of hydrogen air taxi
description: Darsh Dronobotics Systems has partnered with Trouve Innovation Hub Inc. to develop a hydrogen-based five-seater air taxi. This collaboration aims to combat climate change, reduce carbon emissions, and support India's net zero goals. The air taxi will offer eco-friendly urban transportation with zero emissions and reduced operating costs.
